definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: And salt and Glauber's salt mainly constitute of dissolving salts.
sentences.chinese: 其中易溶鹽的主要成分是石鹽和芒硝。

sentences.english: The intercrystalline unconfined brine has extensively arrived at the stage of sylvite-precipitation.
sentences.chinese: 晶間潛滷水已普遍進入鉀石鹽析出階段。

sentences.english: There is a sylvine deposit in Yunnan Province of China.
sentences.chinese: 我國雲南有一個鉀石鹽礦藏。
